mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ripley, James Wolfe
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 4 1863. By Telegraph from Washington 5pm 4 1863. Two thousand 2000 light rifles and accoutrements will be sent to you at once from Washington and two hundred thousand 200,000 cartridges from Pittsburgh JW Ripley Brig Genl Chf Ord 22G59pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Ripley, James Wolfe
Washington, D.C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
